name: Women's Loafer Shoes/slippers  sewing pattern
description:
These are so comfortable to wear at home, that you'll soon have friends asking for a pair :-)
They can be sewn from lighter cotton fabrics, like quilting cotton, from heavier, like jeans fabric or even from wool for the winter.
Size included are US 2 to US 11

name: Baby Lilly Shoes
description: Cute baby Lilly shoes to make for your little one or friends. These make great gift for a baby shower or birthday. Baby Lilly sewing pattern includes a full color picture tutorial with all the steps needed to finish the project and patterns in approximate age sizing from newborn to 24 months. The heel is elastic, so these will be very hard to kick off.

name: Girls Buble Sleeveless Dress
description:
Super cute girls bubble / balloon dress for Summer.
Sizes included are 12Months to 6T
No lining required.

name: Girls Kimono Top
description:
Featuring a hanging pocket, this kimono top is super cute for the Summer days, but can be made out of flannel too and worn with a tshirt in Fall or a turtle neck in the Winter.
The pattern gives two finishing options.
Sizes included in pattern are 12 Months to 6T

name: Baby Paul Shoes
description:
Cute little shoes for baby boys!
These have an elastic heel and tiny ties. Very easy to slip on
Can be made from quilting scraps, as the pattern pieces are so small.
Pattern includes sizes Newborn to 24 Months

name: "Une petite Parisienne"  Baby and toddler skirt pattern
description:
Baby, toddler and girls up to 6T elastic waist skirt - Une Petite Parisienne. This sewing pattern comes with a picture tutorial for each step needed to sew it.

Suitable fabrics are quilting cotton, batiste, seersucker and other light weight fabrics.
2 fabrics, 1/2 yard of each needed for all sizes.

Fabrics used: "L’Amour De La Vie" designed by Hoodie

The sizes included are :
US: 9M, 12M, 18M, 2T, 3T, 4T, 5T, 6T
EU: 72, 80, 86, 92, 98, 104, 110, 116

Yes, you can sell the garments made from this pattern, as long as it is not a mass production, but a small business.

Thank you!

name: Woman's Mary Jane Shoes Sewing Pattern
description:
Mary Jane's for grown ups :-)
Easy to sew and maintain - just throw in the washing machine
Sizes included are US 2 to 11, EU 32 to 42
Fabrics used are cotton and linen plus batting/wadding for the soles.

name: Girl's undies / panties - 12 months to 6 years
description:
Easy to sew and comfortable to wear girl's undies 
Whip a pair in just a few minutes! 
Make organic underwear or match color to outfit
Pattern can be used for swimwear

name: Formal baby ballerina shoes pattern
description:
Easy Sewing Pattern for Formal Ballerina Baby Shoes - 0-24 months - DIY - PDF
Easy to make 
This is a very impressive ballerina shoes pattern to go with any formal dress of your little girl. Just pick complementing fabrics and whip in an hour!
The file includes a picture tutorial and a materials list.
Approximate age sizes include 0 to 24 months.

name: Boho Bib Tunic - pdf Sewing pattern and picture tutorial - baby, toddler, kid - sizes 12-18M to 6T -
description:
Boho toddler tunic- PDF Sewing pattern and picture tutorial - baby, toddler, kid - sizes 12-18M to 6T - 86EU to 116EU
The pattern includes picture tutorial on how to sew it.

Suitable fabrics are baby cord, flannel, quilting cotton, cotton/linen mix and other mid weight fabrics.
1 to 1 1/5 yard needed for this project.

Thank you!

description:

This pdf sewing pattern is for a very easy swimsuit for babies, toddlers and kids. It comes with a picture tutorial for each step needed to sew it.


Suitable fabrics are swimwear and lycra jerseys. You'll need around 1/2 yard / meter and 1 yard/meter clear elastic tape 5mm wide.

This is an instant download. Once you complete checkout, the link for download will be sent to you via e-mail and you could be sewing within minutes :-)


The sizes included are :
US: 12 - 18M, 2T, 3T, 4T, 5T, 6T

name: Baby-friendly Doll Sewing Pattern - PDF
description:
This doll is carefully designed with lots of love and thought about all the little hands, that are going to hug it!
The shape is very baby-friendly and even smallest babies can hug the doll safely.
For the bigger ones there are the two sets of clothes - boy’s and girl’s, and a diaper to play with and learn some basic skills, like opening and closing velcro,
placing the hoop to catch the button and few others.

The patterns for all the clothes on the picture are included with the baby pattern!


The entire project can be completed using fabric scraps and few pieces elastic. 
It can be done easily from felt too.
Difficulty level - beginner
Time to finish entire project - 1 day

Hope that you will enjoy making dolls for your little ones! It’s a real pleasure to watch them play with the new baby doll!

You'll be sent an instant download link, right after completing checkout.
